title: ESA Re evaluation for 4th semester CSE
content: I'm considering going for a re-evaluation; how many days will it take for the results, and will marks be deducted, and is the re-evaluation fee refundable?

comments.body: Re-evaluation takes about 2-3 weeks . You won't get your marks reduced. Fee will be refunded only if your grade changes(to higher grade obviously) not marks .
Is there a chance they will increase?
Yeah if you are confident that your score is near the next higher grade .
